trans-unit.source: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> which should receive scroll messages.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer basisklasse for utvidelse utformingen modus virkemåten for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som skal motta rullefeltet meldinger.

trans-unit.source: ScrollableControlDesigner provides a base class for designers of controls that respond to scroll messages.
trans-unit.target: ScrollableControlDesigner inneholder en basisklasse for utviklere Kontroller at svar for å rulle meldinger.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ParentControlDesigner>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> classes, ScrollableControlDesigner provides a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method override that passes WM_HSCROLL and WM_VSCROLL messages to the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til metodene og funksjonalitet arvet fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ParentControlDesigner>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner>, og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>klasser ScrollableControlDesigner gir en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>metoden override som sender WM_HSCROLL og WM_VSCROLL meldinger til kontrollen under utformingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ParentControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a form has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A> property set to active, the scroll bars are always active in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis et skjema har den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A>egenskapen er satt til aktiv side-felt er alltid aktive i miljøet utformingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can associate a designer with a type using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan knytte en designer til en type med en <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For en oversikt over tilpasse utformingen nå virkemåte, kan du se [utvider støtte for utforming](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the control.
trans-unit.target: Angir om et museklikk på det angitte punktet skal behandles av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The GetHitTest method determines whether a click at the specified point should be passed to the control, while the control is in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetHitTest bestemmer om et klikk på det angitte punktet skal sendes til kontrollen, mens kontrollen i utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: You can override and implement this method to enable your control to receive clicks in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre og Implementer denne metoden hvis du vil aktivere kontrollen mottar Klikk i miljøet utformingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan du sende et punkt i skjermkoordinater til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen for å hente koordinatene for punktet i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> indicating the position at which the mouse was clicked, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som angir posisjonen der musen ble klikket, i skjermkoordinater.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a click at the specified point is to be handled by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et klikk på angitte punkt som skal behandles av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages and passes WM_HSCROLL and WM_VSCROLL messages to the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger, og sender WM_HSCROLL og WM_VSCROLL meldinger til kontrollen under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: This override of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A> method passes any WM_HSCROLL and WM_VSCROLL messages to the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne overstyring av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A>metoden sender WM_HSCROLL og WM_VSCROLL meldinger til kontrollen under utformingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: All messages are first passed to the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Alle meldinger som sendes først med grunntallet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A>
